name: Seeker's Token
description: Found on some scaffolding in Excavation Site.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Lying high up on the rocks by an old tower. You can reach it by climbing onto scaffolding nearby then jumping or levitating toward this cliff

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of the stone pillar near the Grand Riftstone of Battahl.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found hidden in the tall grass on the ground.

name: Seeker's Token - Flamebearer Palace History Chamber
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of a stack of books inside the Flamebearer Palace History Chamber building.

name: Seeker's Token - Northwest of Volcanic Island Camp
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of the rocky hill northwest of the Volcanic Island Camp.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a small path along the cliff southwest of Volcanic Island Camp.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a small cliff next to the river.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the cliffside, south of Riftstone of Daybreak. Accessed by navigating the upper rocks of the bandit town

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the edge of a cliff above a wooden bridge.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found hidden in the grass on the southeast side of the tower.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found slightly on the cliffside.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found beside the chest by the riftstone.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found high on the cliffs above the campsite. Access it by following the road up first.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a pillar above the road.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Can be found on a ledge, over the water.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token lies within the half-submerged wagon resting on the beach.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token awaits on the western side of the Vernworth Hall roof.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be discovered atop the roof of Rose Chateau Bordelrie, on the chimney. Accessed by levitating up from the balcony.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be found on the cliff above Eldart's Apothecary.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token found inside a broken tower by the side of the road. Accessed by levitating or prompting oneself up.

name: Seeker's Token - Cliff's Edge Bridge of Theordracus the Second
description: Located on a cliff behind a treasure chest, hiding behind a rock.

name: Seeker's Token - Above the Marsh
description: This one is laying on some rocks way above the marsh. You have to climb up to it or follow the road down from Rock Wall Berme. It shares the platform with a nearby chest of gold

name: Seeker's Token - Battahl Ropeway Station Three
description: Located on the second level of scaffolding inside the Battahl Ropeway Station Three. You need to take the lift down to get inside or levitate into the area

name: Seeker's Token - Waterfall
description: Located on the rocks just to the right of the waterfall, nearly inside it.

name: Seeker's Token - Harpy Nest
description: Located in a Harpy nest up on some rocks.

name: Seeker's Token - Stragglers' Cave
description: A Seeker's Token found inside Stragglers' Cave. It's on a deeper tunnel behind some breakables. The same room that has a ladder.

name: Seeker's Token - Tall Grass
description: This Seeker's Token is located in the tall grass making it hard to see.

name: Seeker's Token - Harpy Nest Statue
description: Located near the Dimdark Cave, in a Harpy nest just below the statue.

name: Seeker's Token
description: On the cliff above the road.

name: Seeker's Token - Cliffside
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of some cliffs above the road.

name: Seeker's Token - Dragonsbreath Tower
description: Found on a broken ledge in the 4F of Dragonsbreath Tower

name: Seeker's Token - Dragonsbreath Tower Broken Pillar
description: Located on the 5F of Dragonsbreath Tower atop a broken pillar by the stairs.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found on the grass on the rocks above the road

name: Seeker's Token
description: Located inside the Flamebearer Palace to the left of the altar on the ground.

name: Seeker's Token - Bakbattahl Gaol
description: Located in the third jail cell to the left from the entrance in Bakbattahl Gaol. It's the same cell where Ashe will be incarcerated after Mercy Among Thieves

name: Seeker's Token
description: Laying on some rocks above the road.

name: Seeker's Token - Cliffside Cave
description: Located on a rock above the road just outside Cliffside Cave.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of the wooden shack.

name: Seeker's Token - Windworn Gully
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the floor inside Windworn Gully.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found sitting on a rock by the path near the Howling Cave.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a cliff on top of the waterfall.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the southewestern corner of Frontier Shrine, outside the shrine bounds on the narrow ground before the cliff.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of a rock pillar east of Enoa'Battahl Forest, just above the shore.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top some rocks on the south side of the path, near the Cyclops spawn

name: Seeker's Token - Flamebearer Palace Audience Chamber
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the floor next to the candles in the Flamebearer Palace Audience Chamber.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a high cliff edge located north of Trevo Mine. This area can be accessed from the campsite at the abandoned village to the north and use the wooden scaffolds to get across and follow the path until you reach the token. It requires you to use Levitate or Concussive Step to reach the area.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found atop a rock, climb up the tent and keep climbing to reach the token.

name: Seeker's Token - Vermund Charnel House
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in above Charnel House in Vernworth. Once you reach the area, you'll notice a giant hole just before the last coffin with two braziers on the side, approach the hole in the middle and drop down to pick up a Seeker's Token.

name: Seeker's Token - Cropper's Quarter
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of a rock in the middle of a lake near Cropper's Quarter. Be careful in traversing the area and find a way to reach the rock without touching the water. Try circling around the area, there's a spot where you can gather ore. From there, leap across to reach the rock.

name: Seeker's Token - Forgotten Riftstone
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of a hill where the Forgotten Riftstone is located. Look behind the statue positioned at the center to find it.

name: Seeker's Token - Bandit Camp
description: A Seeker's Token can be found near a bandit camp. The Seeker's Token is situated on top of a rock near the waterfall.

name: Seeker's Token - Northeast of Underbridge Grotto
description: A Seeker's Token can be found inside an open basket on a bridge northeast of Underbridge Grotto.

name: Seeker's Token - Northeast of Palace Overlook Cape
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the edge of a cliff northeast of the Palace Overlook Cape.

name: Seeker's Token - Nameless Village
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a cliff North of Nameless Village, just east of the Old Noble Manor.

name: Seeker's Token - The Gracious Hand's Vaults
description: A Seeker's Token can be found within The Gracious Hand's Vaults. The vault is situated in the Slums area of Vernworth.

name: Seeker's Token - Guerco Cavern 1
description: A Seeker's Token can be found inside Guerco Cavern. Once inside, continue following the main path and it'll lead you to a fork. Take the bridge on the right and you'll enter an area where the Seeker's Token is located.

name: Seeker's Token - Guerco Cavern 2
description: A Seeker's Token can be found inside Guerco Cavern. Upon entering the first room, drop down and search amidst the rubble, resembling the remains of a destroyed golem.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the edge near a waterfall in Malachine Forest, past a Golem encounter

name: Seeker's Token - Northeast of Arboreal Ruins
description: A Seeker's Token can be found northeast of Arboreal Ruins by the lake.

name: Seeker's Token - Kough's Inn
description: A Seeker's Token can be found inside Kough's Inn in Sacred Arbor. It is located atop a structure supported by four pillars where a female elf is situated. You'll immediately find this once you enter the inn, as the elf stationed there is responsible for accommodating and welcoming customers to stay at the place.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the edge of a cliff in the Saurian Nest

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found next to the dock at the seashore, it's easier to find at night.

name: Seeker's Token - Northeast of Riftstone of Fellowship
description: A Seeker's Token can be found atop a rock on the left side of a small tunnel located northeast of the Riftstone of Fellowship and northwest of the Riftstone of the Fanged.

name: Seeker's Token - Northeast of Riverside Cavern
description: A Seeker's Token can be found at the edge of a hill northeast of the Riverside Cavern.

name: Seeker's Token - West of Beren's Childhood Home
description: A Seeker's Token can be found atop a hill just west of Beren's Childhood Home.

name: Seeker's Token - Crumbling Ruins
description: A Seeker's Token can be found atop one of the structures within the Crumbling Ruins.

name: Seeker's Token
description: It can be found in one of the sewers of the city.

name: Seeker's Token - Southeast of Forgotten Ruins
description: A Seeker's Token can be found southeast of the Forgotten Ruins. It is located on the edge of a cliff near a chest.

name: Seeker's Token - Reverent Shrine
description: A Seeker's Token can be found directly on top of Reverent Shrine. Take the ladder on the left side and make your way up the roof.

name: Seeker's Token - Riftstone of Potential
description: To locate the Seekers Token, venture along the northern path and delve into The Mountains’ Secret cavern. Upon emerging on the other side, you'll encounter a Riftstone of Potential nestled beside an abandoned structure. Inside the building, the token rests atop a crate adjacent to a chest.

name: Seeker's Token
description: You'll discover the Seeker's Token nestled within the Goblin/Harpy Camp atop a hill, southeast of the Forgotten Riftstone. This camp lies to the west of Moonglow Garden/Beren's Tent. Keep an eye out for the token resting snugly within one of the Harpy nests.

name: Seeker's Token - Dracanward
description: You'll stumble upon the Seeker's Token in the Town of Melve, perched atop the Dracanward tower. Look for it on the platform adorned with the ballista.

name: Seeker's Token - Trembling Hollow
description: The Seeker's Token is in the 2F of Trembling Hollow cave. Climb the rocks outside the small garden and break through a boulder to access an area infested with skeletal foes. You'll discover the token nestled in a corner of the first room you encounter.

name: Seeker's Token - Ruined Settlement
description: The Seeker's Token lies waiting within the ruins of the settlement, located northeast of Vernworth. Make your way to the Ruined Settlement area and head for the northwest building. There, on the ground, you'll discover the token hidden amidst the debris.

name: Seeker's Token - Spirit’s Path Cave
description: The Seeker's Token can be found in the depths of Spirit's Path Cave. As you enter the cave from the top, where humanoid enemies roam, follow the path until you reach a dead end near the water. There, against the cliff edge, you'll find the token hidden under a rock that you can move

name: Seeker's Token
description: At the Riverside Ruins Riftstone, atop the ancient ruins by the riftstone, lies the Seeker's Token. You'll need to leap across the gaps to reach the token perched precariously on high.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Seeker's Token found atop the archway southern entryway to the ruins.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found next to the eastern entrance to the Cavern of the Forsaken, right by a droppable ladder on the high cliffs by the road.

name: Seeker's Token - Waterfall Cave
description: Can be found inside Waterfall Cave 2F. You need to get past a breakable wall that creates a narrow passageway before the Wight Fight and an area with blue light.

name: Seekers Token - Atop Grand Rifstone of Vermund
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the roofs of the Grand Rifstone of Vermund building in Vernworth. It is surrounded by three chests. You can reach this area by using nearby ladders and running across the rooftops

name: Seeker's Token
description: You'll discover it nestled against a gravestone perched atop the cliff's edge.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of a rock at the edge of a cliff, behind a treasure chest.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Can be found on a ledge down the cliff over the water.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found inside a broken tower near the top of the castle at Ancient Battleground.

name: Seeker's Token - Riftstone of Perseverance
description: A Seeker's Token can be found atop an erect rock structure near the Rift of Perseverance located north of Volcanic Island Camp.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be found behind the stone statue.

name: Seeker's Token
description: You can locate the Seeker's Token nestled snugly within a harpy nest, right next to a lush grape bush.

name: Seeker's Token
description: You can discover the Seeker's Token perched atop a ledge overlooking the waters below.

name: Seeker's Token
description: There's a path on the side of the mountain you can take without falling down to a lower level, the Seeker's Token can be found on the ground.

name: Seeker's Token
description: At the cliff, reach it by walking all around the other way.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token is found on the river shore, outside the boundry of the town.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the cliffs near the Marshland Settlement.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token lies at the base of a statue, marking the terminus of the southern ascent along the uphill path.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Laying on some rocks behind a tree. Access by following the narrow path along the cliffside from Rocky Crevasse.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found lying on a cliff north of Drabnir's Grotto.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token found near the Strange Corridor Second Entrance in the Misty Marshes. It will be on the floor by a pool of water just south the road from the cave

name: Seeker's Token
description: Above a pit inside Mountain Base Cave 3F. Jump across a small gap to it.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found inside Mountain Base Cave 3F guarded by a sleeping lizard.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token found hidden behind bushes and the rush of water on the shores of a waterfall.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Lying on a broken pillar next to the bath. You have to jump over the from the roof to reach it.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Lying on the ground directly behind Volcanic Island Armory.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Seeker's Token found atop the broken walkways in the area. You must drop from above to obtain it.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token found atop a pot in B1F of the Forgotten Tunnel.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Lying on a cloth draped above the marketplace in Bakbattahl. You have to climb up and jump from cloth to cloth to get it.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found on some rocks in Bakbattahl near the mural in Mural Byway. You have to climb up them to get it.

name: Seeker's Token
description: High up on some rocks nearly directly above the Rare Book Stand. You can climb up near the mural at Mural Byway.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token found within the Forgotten Tunnel (B1F). To reach it, climb atop the roof of the ruined gazebo, and jump across the broken platforms.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Located above the mural at Mural Byway in Bakbattahl. You have to climb up the rocks very high, and it's laying on the top of the pillars above.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token found at the very top of the columns of the ruins. Accessible by coming from Sacred Arbor and going down the stairs in the forest.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Seeker's Token found in Arboreal Ruins. Reach it by going up the broken stairs and jumping across platforms.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token found atop the broken archway above the road

name: Seeker's Token
description: Seeker's Token found on the very edge of the broken bridge

name: Seeker's Token
description: Can be found on the rock near the river.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Can be found atop the high rocks south of the river, near the Grim Ogre spawn

name: Seeker's Token
description: You can find the Seeker's Token located east of the Forgotten Riftstone at the foot of Shutram Falls. It's hidden in a small dark nook alongside the cliff

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found atop a cliff slightly east from Shutram Falls. It's easiest to access by climbing up the rocks west of the waterfall and following the road up past the Harpy nests.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Can be found inside the destructible waterfall.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Seeker's Token found in a room full of Leapworms under the ballista in Ancient Battleground.

name: Seeker's Token - Atop the fountain
description: A Seeker's Token can be found atop a fountain west of Townsend's Estate at the Noble Quarter of Vernworth.

name: Seeker's Token - Vernworth Fountain
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in the water of Vernworth Fountain.

name: Seeker Token
description: The Seeker's Token is located on the wooden planks atop the roof.

name: Seeker's Token - Foot of the Statue
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the foot of the statue northwest of Clovis's Barberie.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be found in the water, beside the small bridge.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be found on the top floor of the tower. You'll need to jump over to the location from the balcony beyond the stone wall.

name: Seeker's Token - Bridge Tower
description: A Seeker's Token can be found atop the bridge tower in Vernworth.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Seeker's Token can be discovered at the foot of the towering statue situated atop the hill.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found at the end of the dock, northeast of the Bridge of Theodracus the Second.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Seeker's Token can be spotted at the cliff's edge, overlooking the waters below.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be discovered atop a rock jutting out from the shoreline.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Can be found on top of a broken wall.

name: Seeker's Token - Field Southwest of Great Bridge Passage
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in the middle of the field west of the Great Bridge Passage.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found lying on the rocks above the road.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token rests on a rock near the water's edge.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Lying on the beach, guarded by a lizard.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Seeker's Token can be found on the roof of the abandoned shack with two chests.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Laying on top of a pillar near a chest.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be discovered outside the cave, nestled at the base of the tallest rock.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Laying on the side of a bridge, behind a column.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token awaits on a boulder beneath the cascading waterfall.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token perches atop a boulder. Head to the nearby tower and leap from the second floor to reach it

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token rests on the rocky beach below the bridge.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token is found on the outer side of the wall, alongside a narrow rocky pathway.

name: Seeker's Token - Baldwin's Estate
description: The Seeker's Token perches atop the roof of Baldwin's estate, leap from the upper level to get it.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Located on the rocks directly above the Tomb of Ja'Nuwa.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a ledge near the road.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token found on the ground by the cliffside of the road where Hobgoblins and Rattlers fight.

name: Seeker's Token - Coastal Cavern
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the ground within the Coastal Cavern. Make your way inside and you'll find the token on the ground near a chest.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found laying on some rocks near the road. You have to climb up to it.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Laying on a rock near the Riftstone of the Straightforward.

name: Seeker's Token - Near the ruins
description: A Seeker's Token can be found near the ruins, southwest of the Forgotten Riftstone.

name: Seeker's Token - Trevo Mine
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the eastern cliff near the entrance of Trevo Mine.

name: Seeker's Token - Near the Forgotten Riftstone
description: A Seeker's Token can be found near the Forgotten Riftstone

name: Seeker's Token
description: Located on the ground inside the Tomb of Al'Guttos

name: Seeker's Token - Abandoned Village
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on one of the rooftops in the Abandoned Village.

name: Seeker's Token - Old Lighthouse
description: A Seeker's Token can be found at the top of the Old Lighthouse. You'll need to hug the edges once you reach the top and jump over the corner to reach the token.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Seeker's Token found inside Waterfall Cave (2F). The token is hidden away behind some breakable barrels in the same area where you drop down a ladder (past the Wight fight).

name: Seeker's Token
description: Lying on the high cliffs near a chest with a Ferrystone, just below the stone bridge.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Lying on the cliff edge, just past the collapsed wooden tower.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Laying on the head of the statue near the Riftstone.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Laying on the ground inside the Darkbeasts' Den.

name: Seeker's Token - Indigent Bedlands
description: A Seeker's Token can be found near the Indigent Bedlands. Go down the ladder within the ruined building to the basement, and destroy the boxes you immediately find to pick up the token.

name: Seeker's Token - Twilight Cave 1
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in a harpy nest within the Twilight Cave.

name: Seeker's Token - Twilight Cave 2
description: A Seeker's Token can be found under a destructible boulder in the Twilight Cave outer area, near the one in the nest, on the small ledge that overlooks the area.

name: Seeker's Token - Twilight Cave 3
description: A Seeker's Token can be found inside a small pool of water within the Twilight Cave.

name: Seeker's Token - East of Underbridge Grotto
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a ledge over the river east of Underbridge Grotto (Second Entrance).

name: Seeker's Token - Southwest of Nameless Village
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a rock down by the lake southwest of Nameless Village.

name: Seeker's Token - Southwest of Old Noble Manor
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a ledge over the water southwest of Old Noble Manor.

name: Seeker's Token - Old Noble Manor
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the second floor of the Old Noble Manor.

name: Seeker's Token - Underbridge Grotto
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the second floor of the Underbridge Grotto.

name: Seeker's Token - Northeasst of Timeworn Shaft
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the edge of a cliff northeast of Timeworn Shaft.

name: Seeker's Token - North of Timeworn Shaft
description: A Seeker's Token can be found near the edge of a cliff, north of Timeworn Shaft.

name: Seeker's Token - Northewest of Riverside Ruins
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a ledge up the cliff northwest of Riverside Ruins.

name: Seeker's Token - Northeast of Indigent Bedlands
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a rock ledge up a cliff northeast of Indigent Bedlands.

name: Seeker's Token - Behind Forgotten Riftstone
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in a corner behind a Forgotten Riftstone.

name: Seeker's Token - Southwest of Riftstone of Remembrance
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of a rock at the bottom of a slide southwest of Riftstone of Remembrance.

name: Seeker's Token - Northeast of Mt. Alles Tunnel
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a small ledge over the water northeast of Mt. Alles Tunnel.

name: Seeker's Token - Mt. Alles Tunnel (Second Entrance)
description: A Seeker's Token can be found behind the statue near a chest and waterfall near Mt. Alles Tunnel (Second Entrance).

name: Seeker's Token - Small Canyon
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in a small canyon behind some trees in a corner near Mt. Alles Tunnel.

name: Seeker's Token - West of Great Bridge Passage
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of a broken structure west of the Great Bridge Passage.

name: Seeker's Token - North of Coastal Cavern
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in a harpy nest situated on the cliff edge above the water, just north of the Coastal Cavern.

name: Seeker's Token - Northeast of Cavern of the Forsaken
description: A Seeker's Token can be found at the edge of a cliff northeast of the Cavern of the Forsaken.

name: Seeker's Token - East of Gathering of Beasts
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of the stone pillar just east of Gathering of Beasts.

name: Seeker's Token - North of Gathering of Beasts
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in a corner near a chest, on the higher platform north of Gathering of Beasts.

name: Seeker's Token - Borderwatch Outpost
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the roof of the forge in Borderwatch Outpost.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found atop the path west of Forgotten Riftstone, above the Saurian Nest and Goblin ambush

name: Seeker's Token - South of Collapsed Mine
description: A Seeker's Token can be found to the left of the first ladder beside the cliff south of the Collapsed Mine.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the roof of the shack northeast of the Bridge of Theodracus the Second.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Laying on some rocks above a bunch of Bandits.

name: Seeker's Token - West of Northern Harve Ruins
description: A Seeker's Token can be found next to a washed-up boat by the shore west of the Northern Harve Ruins.

name: Seeker's Token - Under the bridge
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the shore under the bridge.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a small ledge by the shore near the wooden bridge

name: Seeker's Token - Northeast of Trevo Mine
description: A Seeker's Token can be found at the end of a large naturally formed cave northeast of the Trevo Mine.

name: Seeker's Token - Darkhorde Cave
description: A Seeker's Token can be found at the end of the ravine near the Darkhorde Cave.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Laying on the rock near the waterfall and the chest with Legend's Mantle inside Thunderclap Cave.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Can be found in Illdoer's Resting Place in the puddles just before and left of the gallows and near a hanging cage.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Laying on the ground inside a broken building near 2 chests.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token found within Worldsend Cavern 1F. It's on a platform next to a chest after breaking a boulder to uncover a path soon after the entrance.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token found by following the rough path down from Shrine Corridor. It's perched on the ledge of a tall cliff.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of a rock outcropping.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found atop a broken pillar.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found behind a large rock, right in front of a small bush.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found near the river's edge.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found the rock ledge before descending to the nest on the left side of the cliff. This can only be approached by climbing up the rocks from the southern side.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the roof of the Abandoned Home next to the well.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found near the broken pillar. To reach it, take the road down from Abandoned Home and then take a left and follow the shoreline North-West. Your pawns will point out to levitate upward.

name: Seeker's Token - Broken Pillar 2
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in the corner of a cliff by a broken pillar.

name: Seeker's Token - Rock Wall Berme
description: A Seeker's Token can be found inside Rock Wall Berme, on top of a rock at the end of the cavern.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in a ruined tower behind some rubble.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of the ruins before entering the gate.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found south of the tower, between the two walls, next to a blue flag.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found a ledge outside the temple.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of the arch in Checkpoint Rest Town.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Found on some rocks way up near some Harpy nests. You can climb up from the road.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the cliffside. You can climb the ruins north of here to have access to the token.

name: Seeker's Token - Chimera Den
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on a rock above the Chimera's den.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of the rock.

name: Seeker's Token - South of Enoa'Battahl Forest
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the ground in the higher cliffs overlooking the stream, south of the campsite and Enoa'Battahl Forest.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found in a tent, west of the statue.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on some rocks past the hobgoblins and the campfire on the higher area above the river.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found resting on the base of the statue.

name: Seeker's Token - Tomb of Am'Ranna
description: A Seeker's Token can be found at the end of the first hallway inside the Tomb of Am'Ranna. Be careful as there is a false floor that will break.

name: Seeker's Token
description: You'll discover the Seeker's Token resting atop a rock along the southwestern shoreline of the tower.

name: Seeker's Token
description: You can locate the Seeker's Token atop the eastern wall's battlements.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token is situated on the cliff, just beyond the castle walls.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be discovered atop the fully intact pillar. Ascend the nearby cliff to reach it.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token awaits at the river's edge, right before the waterfall.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be discovered by following the path along the cliff's edge from the main road.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token is situated halfway up the cliff, positioned above the forgotten riftstone.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Can be found on the Waterfall.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token awaits behind the chest and tree, perched on the cliff, overlooking the tranquil waters below.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Seeker's Token found on the shoreline. It's on the ground hidden behind a large rock.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on top of a pile of rocks next to the sea cliff.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found near a campsite, south of Windwalker's Home. The token is atop a steep cliff next to the campsite, that you can climb from the western side

name: Seeker's Token
description: Can be found on the top of a big rock.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be discovered atop the half-destroyed wall.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token awaits halfway up the cliffside, tucked around the side. Descend to a larger ledge and find it resting against the wall.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found In the pool of water in the Dye Stores area.

name: Seeker's Token
description: Token is found inside the Forbidden Magic Research Lab B1F, at the bottom of the pit amid dragon bones piles in the Refuse Storage section of the laboratory.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token is located inside the Forbidden Magic Research Lab, adjacent to the head of the dragon corpse.

name: Seeker's Token
description: The Seeker's Token can be discovered to the south of the Forgotten Riftstone, positioned along the edge of the cliffside.

name: Seeker's Token
description: A Seeker's Token can be found on the rocks against the cliff under the campsite by Dragonsbreath Tower. Best accessed by slowly dropping from the road above rather than the campsite
